name: code-server
description: Visual Studio Code combines the simplicity of a code editor with what developers need for their core edit-build-debug cycle. It provides comprehensive code editing, navigation, and understanding support along with lightweight debugging, a rich extensibility model, and lightweight integration with existing tools.

paths.name: Appdata
paths.description: Configuration files and user settings for code-server.

ports.name: WebUI
ports.description: Web interface port for accessing VS Code in the browser.

variables.name: HASHED_PASSWORD
variables.description: Pre-hashed password for web interface (alternative to PASSWORD).

variables.name: SUDO_PASSWORD
variables.description: Password for sudo commands within the container.

variables.name: PROXY_DOMAIN
variables.description: Domain name for reverse proxy configuration.

variables.name: DEFAULT_WORKSPACE
variables.description: Default workspace folder opened on startup.

variables.name: PWA_APPNAME
variables.description: Progressive Web App name shown in browser.

variables.name: UMASK
variables.description: File creation mask for new files.
